RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 1 1 1/16M Turf CR: 72. Claiming Purse 13600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since August 13, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To H orses That Have Not Started For Less Than $10,000). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and a Sixteenth.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BEOCCA steadied along inside while in perfect position throughout, got through past the quarter and stretch to rally clear under good handling to the wire. DESERT HIGHWAY speed to the front, set pace to the stretch, outkicked stretch. GUNLEATHER AL chased leader to far turn from inside bid quarter pole, showed. CONNECT ME no speed to far turn, rallied along in the stretch to improve. DIAL HIM UP chased top pair to the half with nothing left from the far turn. GRASSROOTS never prominent to far turn with nothing left in the drive. DOM GERVASIO dwelt at the start while always far back. Race was hand timed due to a bad sensor on the turf course, all turf races will be hand timed for the remainder of the meet

ENTRY.NAME: Beocca
ENTRY.COMMENT: steadied along inside to half, rallied into stretch to go clear

ENTRY.NAME: Grassroots
ENTRY.COMMENT: never prominent to far turn with nothing left in the drive

ENTRY.NAME: Gunleather Al
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased leader to far turn from inside bid quarter pole, showed

ENTRY.NAME: Dom Gervasio
ENTRY.COMMENT: dwelt at the start while always far back

ENTRY.NAME: Dial Him Up
ENTRY.OWNER: AOM Racing Stables LLC and Diamond Hands Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased top pair to the half with nothing left from the far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Desert Highway
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to the front, set pace to the stretch, outkicked stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Connect Me
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed to far turn, rallied along in the stretch to improve

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 2 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 32. Maiden Claiming Purse 16900. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TWILIGHT BEAUTY ran up rail to the turn, angled out past the quarter pole to run clear in the stretch. SHEZ IN A TIZZY chased leader to the turn took mover into stretch but outkicked in the stretch. SUPER SCAMP ran on show spot. MYSTIC ANN never menaced. APPALACHIAN SPIRIT brief speed, stopped to a walk in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Twilight Beauty
ENTRY.COMMENT: ran up rail to the turn, angled out to run clear in the stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Super Scamp
ENTRY.COMMENT: ran on show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Mystic Ann
ENTRY.COMMENT: never menaced

ENTRY.NAME: Shez in a Tizzy
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased leader to the turn took mover into stretch, outkicked

ENTRY.NAME: Appalachian Spirit
ENTRY.OWNER: Clark Rick Clark Brent W Wolfe Joe and Cline Robert C
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed, stopped to a walk in the stretch

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 69. Claiming Purse 11600. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since August 13, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Ohio Regi stered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ELLIE DELI sat off leaders to the turn with a three wide run into stretch to run clear under good handling to the wire. GRANADICA between horses to the front, between foes and collared stretch, fought back for 2d. WATER FIGHT chased, dueled to the stretch while outgamed for place spot at the wire. MOON PARTY always trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Water Fight
ENTRY.OWNER: AOM Racing Stables LLC and Diamond Hands Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, dueled to the stretch, outgamed for place spot at wire

ENTRY.NAME: Granadica
ENTRY.COMMENT: between horses to the front, collared stretch, fought back for 2d

ENTRY.NAME: Moon Party
ENTRY.COMMENT: always trailed

ENTRY.NAME: Ellie Deli
ENTRY.OWNER: Giesy Jerry and Danner Douglas W
ENTRY.COMMENT: sat off leaders, three wide run into stretch

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 82. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE MARCH 13, 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON FOUR RACES IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BIG BLUE outside run to the front, stayed clear under stout handling to the wire. MONEY PIT saved ground to far turn, ran on in the stretch for place spot in a game effort. WHEREWEGOIN raced along evenly while never far back to the stretch but faltered in the late. ZERO TO ONEHUNDRED chased pace to the half with a steady decline between horses from the quarter pole. FIRING RANGE raced along evenly to far turn while stopping badly in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Money Pit
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground to far turn, ran on in the stretch for place spot

ENTRY.NAME: Zero to Onehundred
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace to the half with a steady decline between horses

ENTRY.NAME: Firing Range
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly to far turn, stopped badly in the stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Wherewegoin
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly while never far back to stretch, faltered late

ENTRY.NAME: Big Blue
ENTRY.COMMENT: outside run to the front, stayed clear under stout handling

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 5 1M Turf CR: 97. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 18900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $15,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $25,000. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since August 13 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowe d 4 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Claiming Races For $16,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and 70 Yards.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AUTHORITARIAN chased leader to far turn, ran past in the stretch while well clear to the wire. BLUEGRASS PARKWAY trailed to the half, kicked into gear through the far turn with a late run. OVER THE CHANNEL broke out at the start, raced back to far turn, ran for show. BRILLIANT JOURNEY sprinted clear to far turn, collared in the stretch, weakened. KHOZAN'S SUCCESS raced evenly with no response when needed in the stretch. ATTA BOY ANTHONY through early and dropped back readily. AFLEET MOMENT tried to keep up to the stretch with no response in the stretch. The race was hand timed due to a sensor out of order, all turf raced will be hand time for the remainder of the meet,

ENTRY.NAME: Authoritarian
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased leader to far turn, ran past in the stretch well clear

ENTRY.NAME: Bluegrass Parkway
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed to the half, kicked into gear far turn with a late run

ENTRY.NAME: Brilliant Journey
ENTRY.OWNER: Mark D Kuntz LLC and Dalton Kenneth W
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clear to far turn, collared in the stretch, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Khozan's Success
ENTRY.OWNER: Lauer Penny S and Gans Bruce D
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced evenly with no response when needed in the stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Atta Boy Anthony
ENTRY.COMMENT: through early and dropped back readily

ENTRY.NAME: Afleet Moment
ENTRY.COMMENT: tried to keep up to the stretch with no response in the stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Over the Channel
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out at the start, raced back to far turn, ran for show

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 61. Maiden Special Weight Purse 23700. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 120 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PRAYED TODAY sharp to the front, while clear to the half, dueled to the stretch with a game effort to hold sway while keenly handled to the wire. GAPPER awkward start, rushed, dueled into stretch but outgamed to the late. DOUBLE AGENT awkward from the gate, never factored throughout. PLAYFULASITGETS awkward from the gate and never factored throughout. SHAMANS IMAGE never factored while far back always.

ENTRY.NAME: Double Agent
ENTRY.OWNER: WinStar Farm LLC and Blazing Meadows Farm LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward from the gate, never factored throughout

ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward start, rushed, dueled into stretch, outgamed late

ENTRY.NAME: Prayed Today
ENTRY.COMMENT: sharp to the front clear to the half, dueled into stretch, game

ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward from the gate and never factored throuhout

ENTRY.NAME: Shamans Image
ENTRY.OWNER: Barker Scott W and Barker Carol

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 7 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 77. Allowance Purse 17800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 13, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HALLOWEEN sprinted clear in hand to the turn, roused in stretch, ran away. COLOR FIELD good position to the stretch but proved no match for winner. TENPAK chased top pair throughout with no late kick in the lane. ALL ABOUT CROGE wide trip with no response in the lane. A. P. AVATAR never menaced throughout. CONSTITUTIONAL LAW tried to keep up to the turn, took a bad step past the quarter pole and subsequently pulled up in deep stretch while vanned off in distress.

ENTRY.NAME: Halloween
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clear in hand to the turn, roused in stretch, ran away

ENTRY.NAME: A. P. Avatar
ENTRY.COMMENT: never menaced throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Tenpak
ENTRY.OWNER: Megson Berva Tennant Angela and Tennant Kurt
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased top pair throughout with no late kick in the lane

ENTRY.NAME: Constitutional Law
ENTRY.COMMENT: tried to keep up to the turn, pulled up stretch, vanned off

ENTRY.NAME: All About Croge
ENTRY.OWNER: Megson Berva and Hooves and Saddles LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: wide trip with no response in the lane

ENTRY.NAME: Color Field
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position to the stretch but proved no match for winner

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 57. Allowance Purse 25600. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 13, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances) (Pre ference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $16,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BUCKEYE ROSE sprinted clear while well handled throughout, stayed clear to wire in easy fashion while much the best. MISS ELIANA unhurried to turn, rallied outside in earnest for place spot while well clear of the rest in the field. TWENTY FOUR KARAT raced between horses early on with speed, chased winner to turn from inside and stayed on for the show spot. COMPUTER WHIZ broke sharp outside but could not keep to turn, improved position late. SWEET AS MERRIE tried to keep up to the turn but faded in the stretch run. DESDEMONA KAY failed to menace. SHAKA'S LYRIC failed to menace throughout. SAVESOMEFORME broke in a tangle and always outrun. OHIO LADY raced between horses to the turn but gave way readily.

ENTRY.NAME: Desdemona Kay
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace

ENTRY.NAME: Shaka's Lyric
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Twenty Four Karat
ENTRY.COMMENT: between horses early, inside run through the turn, stayed third

ENTRY.NAME: Ohio Lady
ENTRY.COMMENT: between horses to the turn, gave way readily

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Eliana
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried to turn, rallied outside in earnest for place spot

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet as Merrie
ENTRY.COMMENT: tried to keep up to the turn but faded in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Buckeye Rose
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clear while ridden throughout, stayed clear to wire

ENTRY.NAME: Computer Whiz
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharp outside, could not keep to turn, improved position

ENTRY.NAME: Savesomeforme
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in a tangle and had no impact throughout
